mapper.select: select slideshow_path slideshowPath, goods_id goodsId from t_info_slideshow_home where is_deleted = 0 and slideshow_state_id = 1 and start_time <= now() and end_time >= now() order by slideshow_num asc

select b.goods_name goodsName, a.goods_id goodsId, b.goods_image_path goodsImagePath, b.goods_price goodsPrice from t_info_hot_goods a left join t_info_goods b on a.goods_id = b.goods_id where a.is_deleted = 0 and b.goods_state_id = 1 and a.start_time <= now() and a.end_time >= now() order by a.hot_goods_num asc
